channel.title: 数据库 on 为吾优
channel.description: Recent content in 数据库 on 为吾优

item.title: MySQL
item.description: MYSQL 经常使用tips terminal登录：路径 -u 用户名 -p //mac下 /usr/local/mysql/bin/mysql -u root -p 更改初始密码：set password for ‘root’@‘localhost’ = password(‘newPassword’); db 操作 * show databases; * create NEW_DB; * drop NEW_DB; * use DBname; table 操作 * CREATE TABLE table_name (column_name column_type); * DROP TABLE table_name ; * INSERT INTO table_name ( field1, field2,...fieldN ) VALUES ( value1, value2,...valueN ); * SELECT column_name,column_name FROM table_name [WHERE Clause] [OFFSET M ][LIMIT N] * DELETE FROM table_name [WHERE Clause] brew安装MySQL后的提示 ==> .
